snippet: As the National Gallery essentially digests the Corcoran Gallery, the process is unlike anything an American museum has undertaken before.
abstract: National Gallery of Art has begun process of taking works from recently dissolved Corcoran Gallery of Art into its own collection; is set to open temporary exhibitions of American paintings and works on paper from Corcoran collection.
lead_paragraph: As the National Gallery essentially digests the Corcoran Gallery, the process is unlike anything an American museum has undertaken before.

headline.main: Corcoran Gallery Art Transforms National Gallery
headline.print_headline: In Death, a Gallery Reshapes Another
